name: Stelco Holdings Inc.
longDescription: Stelco Holdings Inc is a steel company. It is engaged in the production and selling of steel products for customers in the steel service center, appliance, automotive, energy, construction, pipe and tube industries in North America. The company's product offering includes Stelco Hot Roll Products, Hot Roll Automotive, Stelmax 80, Stelmax 90, Stelmax 100.
